titles.title: Have I An Object Here Below (familiar tune eas

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Have I an object here below Which would divide my heart with Thee Which would divert its even flow In answer to Thy constancy Oh teach me quickly to return And cause my heart afresh to burn{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Have I a hope however dear Which would defer Thy coming Lord Which would detain my spirit here Where naught can lasting joy afford From it my Savior set me free To look and long and wait for Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Be Thou the object bright and fair To fill and satisfy the heart My hope to meet Thee in the air And nevermore from Thee to part That I may undistracted be To follow serve and wait for Thee{/lang-eng}
